PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-09952022-09-16,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder Referring Back to the CRTC Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2022-165
PrecisORDER REFERRING BACK TO THE CRTC BROADCASTING DECISION CRTC 2022-165 in order to refer back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) the decision to renew the broadcasting licences for the English- and French-language audiovisual and audio services of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation for reconsideration and hearing.
AttachmentsAttachment
